oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Message to “Fight Cancer,” displayed on lighted windows at National Life and Accident Insurance Company in downtown Nashville, circa 1970s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A nighttime view of the National Life and Accident Insurance Company skyscraper at with the message displayed on the lighted windows to “Fight Cancer,” circa 1970s. This building was later purchased by the state, the William R. Snodgrass Tennessee Tower). Forms part of Record Group 3. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National Life and Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); William R. Snodgrass Tennessee Tower (Nashville, Tenn.)
